name: Ancient beast 64KB
description:
You are at your grandfather's house and you didn't bring your tablet or anything. He's out and you are bored! But before he left, he said you could play his favorite game, Codebreaker, on his computer.

Will you be able to compute anything on that 200 year old, hard driveless beast before your patience runs out?

Ancient beast 64KB was created for Ludum Dare 36. It's a short, humorous puzzle game about how quaint and unfamiliar computers become after a few decades. I think this concept has a lot of comedic potential, and I hope to one day develop a more fleshed out game around it!

My favorite part is the crank.
